name: Select Energy Services, Inc.
description: Select Energy Services, Inc. is a leading provider of water solutions for the oil and gas industry, specializing in water management and logistics. Founded in 2016 and based in Houston, Texas, the company focuses on meeting the increasing demand for water in hydraulic fracturing operations. Select Energy Services offers a comprehensive suite of services, including water sourcing, transport, storage, and treatment, which are critical for efficient and sustainable production in the oil and gas sector. The company leverages advanced technology and a dedicated workforce to deliver safe, reliable, and environmentally responsible water services. Select Energy Services is committed to innovation and sustainability, aiming to optimize the water supply chain while reducing the environmental footprint associated with water usage in energy extraction. The company’s integrated approach positions it as a vital partner for energy producers, ensuring they have the necessary resources to operate efficiently while adhering to regulatory standards. With a growing portfolio of clients across major oil and gas basins in North America, Select Energy Services is well-equipped to adapt to the evolving dynamics of the energy market, focusing on long-term contracts and strategic partnerships.
